description: As a surge in coronavirus cases and hospitalizations ravage the Upper Midwest, health-care workers deal with severely ill patients who remain skeptical about the existence of the virus.
content: Doering said she has covid-19 patients who need 100 percent-oxygen breathing assistance who will also swear that they dont have the illness that has ended the lives of nearly a quarter-million people… [+3321 chars]
